===Origins===
[[File:Skrull Kill Krew (Earth-616) from Skrull Kill Krew Vol 1 4 Cover.gif|thumb|left]] 
In the early years of their career, the [[Fantastic Four (Earth-616)|Fantastic Four]] defeated a group of [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrull]] spy agents. [[Reed Richards (Earth-616)|Mister Fantastic]], used their own technology to brainwash them into believing that they are Earth cows, and trapped them in that form for life. The [[Skrull Cows (Earth-616)|Skrull Cows]] at one point regained their memories, but one of them is later killed. The remaining three Skrulls were forced to shift into cows and hypnotized into believing they actually were cows, to live out their days grazing in a pasture outside [[King's Crossing]], [[Vermont (State)|Vermont]].{{r|Fantastic Four #2}}{{r|Fantastic Four Annual #17}}

The milk from the Skrull Cows had affected the small dairy town. The Fantastic Four got involved due to [[Jonathan Storm (Earth-616)|Johnny Storm]] dating one of the residents. They helped the town neutralize the threat.{{r|Fantastic Four Annual #17}}

===Team Formation===
Skrull Cows were, by accident, sent to a slaughterhouse and butchered as meat. Skrull Cow meat, when eaten by people, transferred the Skrull's adaptable DNA code into the human's cells, resulting in a condition called ''[[Skrullovoria Induced Skrullophobia]]''.{{r|Skrull Kill Krew #1|2}}

The infected individuals gained the ability to shape-shift like a Skrull, but also developed an intense irrational fear and hatred of the Skrull. Only a small number of people were infected, and many did not survive the initial stages of infection. There are several people whose effects proved slower than others (but technically still dying) were recruited into a team by a man named [[Ryder (Earth-616)|Ryder]]. Ryder was also victim of the syndrome, as he increasingly had irrational impulses to destroy the Skrull. The Skrull Kill Krew normally attacked the Skrull by blowing them away with large high-powered guns.The Skrull Kill Krew's desire to kill Skrulls not only stopped them from killing people but led them to fight other well known individuals, such as [[Wolfgang von Strucker (Earth-616)|Baron Von Strucker]] and [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]].{{r|Skrull Kill Krew #1|5}}

===Secret Invasion===
During the [[Secret Invasion|Skrull Invasion]], [[Ryder (Earth-616)|Ryder]] and [[Heidi Sladkin (Earth-616)|Riot]] met up with [[Delroy Garrett Jr. (Earth-616)|Delroy Garrett Jr.]], the most recent 3-D Man. Learning from him that the Initiative had been compromised by Skrulls, the trio set out to destroy the Skrulls on each team, making ad-hoc members of the remaining super-heroes from each team.{{r|Avengers: The Initiative #16|20}}

==Notable Skrull Kill Krew members==
* [[Ryder (Earth-616)|Ryder]] - is the leader and founder of the group. He of course has the ability to shapeshift, with enhanced strength and reflexes. Ryder also has the ability to teleport. He has a habit of carrying loads of weapons and firearms. Using his abilities he likes to alter his appearance so his hair is changed into snake like tentacles. It is possible that he is one of the original Skrull Cows, with no memory of his past life.
*[[Heidi Sladkin (Earth-616)|Riot]]- (Heidi Sladkin)
*[[Kimberly Dee (Earth-616)|Catwalk]]- (Kimberly Dee)
*[[Rob Fortune (Earth-616)|Dice]]- (Rob Fortune)
*[[Moonstomp (Earth-616)|Moonstomp]]- (Unrevealed)
*[[Delroy Garrett Jr. (Earth-616)|3-D Man]] - (Delroy Garrett Jr.) inherited his powers from the original [[Charles Chandler (Earth-616)|3-D Man]], a 1950's anti-Skrull hero. The new 3D Man had the ability to recognize shape-shifted Skrulls when viewed through his glasses.
